      • getQuorumNumber

        public int getQuorumNumber()
        Retrieves the number of nodes needed to obtain a quorum. We define a quorum for the layout view as n/2+1
        Returns:
        The number of nodes required for a quorum.

      • updateLayout

        public void updateLayout(Layout layout,
                         long rank)
                  throws QuorumUnreachableException,
                         OutrankedException,
                         WrongEpochException
        Drives the consensus protocol for persisting the new Layout. TODO currently the code can drive only one Layout change. If it has to drive a previously incomplete round TODO it will drop it's own set of changes. Need to revisit this. A change of layout proposal consists of a rank and the desired layout.
        Parameters:
        layout - The layout to propose.
        rank - The rank for the proposed layout.
        Throws:
        QuorumUnreachableException - Thrown if responses not received from a majority of layout servers.
        OutrankedException - outranked exception, i.e., higher rank.
        WrongEpochException - wrong epoch number.

      • prepare

        public Layout prepare(long epoch,
                      long rank)
               throws QuorumUnreachableException,
                      OutrankedException,
                      WrongEpochException
        Sends prepare to the current layout and can proceed only if it is accepted by a quorum.
        Parameters:
        rank - The rank for the proposed layout.
        Returns:
        layout
        Throws:
        QuorumUnreachableException - Thrown if responses not received from a majority of layout servers.
        OutrankedException - outranked exception, i.e., higher rank.
        WrongEpochException - wrong epoch number.

      • propose

        public Layout propose(long epoch,
                      long rank,
                      Layout layout)
               throws QuorumUnreachableException,
                      OutrankedException
        Proposes new layout to all the servers in the current layout.
        Throws:
        QuorumUnreachableException - Thrown if responses not received from a majority of layout servers.
        OutrankedException - outranked exception, i.e., higher rank.

      • committed

        public void committed(long epoch,
                      Layout layout)
        Send committed layout to the old Layout servers and the new Layout Servers. TODO Current policy is to send the committed layout once. Need to revisit this in order TODO to drive the new layout to all the involved LayoutServers. TODO The new layout servers are not bootstrapped and will reject committed messages. TODO Need to fix this.
        Throws:
        WrongEpochException - wrong epoch number.

      • committed

        public void committed(long epoch,
                      Layout layout,
                      boolean force)
               throws WrongEpochException
        Send committed layout to the old Layout servers and the new Layout Servers. If force is true, then the layout forced on all layout servers.
        Throws:
        WrongEpochException
